## Grade analisys LAB

### Question 1
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
grades <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```

### Question 2
```{r}
grades |>
  summarise(min(Exam, na.rm = TRUE), max(Exam, na.rm = TRUE), mean(Exam,na.rm = TRUE),n()) |>
  knitr::kable()
```

### Question 3
```{r}
missingstud<-sum(is.na(grades$Exam))
```
There is a total of `r missingstud` students who passed the test

### Question 4
```{r}
ggplot(grades, aes(x=Exam))+
  geom_histogram(binwidth=1.5, na.rm=TRUE) +
  labs(x="Exam grades", y= "count")
```

### Question 5
```{r}
grades |>
  group_by(Group) |>
  summarise(N=n()) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
